text: Karel Knesl (8 April 1942 – 3 September 2020) was a Czech football player. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics, where he won a silver medal. He was born in Pustiměř, Czech Republic. In 1966, he played for the national team. Knesl died in Prague on 3 September 2020, at the age of 78.Zemřel fotbalista Karel Knesl. S Duklou vyhrál ligu i Americký pohár, s reprezentací olympijské stříbro ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Czech footballers Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Czech Republic
title: Karel Knesl
